mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT i.FG_INQUIRY_STATUS,p.FG_POST_ID,p.FG_POST_TITLE, nu.FG_NORMAL_NICKNAME, p.FG_POST_CREATED_AT FROM FG_INQUIRY i JOIN FG_POST p ON i.FG_POST_ID = p.FG_POST_ID JOIN FG_COMMON_USER cu ON p.FG_USER_CODE = cu.FG_USER_CODE JOIN FG_NORMAL_USER nu ON p.FG_USER_CODE = nu.FG_USER_CODE ORDER BY p.FG_POST_CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT p.FG_POST_ID,p.FG_POST_TITLE , uf.FG_USER_FILE_ROOT,uf.FG_USER_FILE_NAME,uf.FG_USER_FILE_UUID, nu.FG_NORMAL_NICKNAME, p.FG_POST_CREATED_AT, i.FG_INQUIRY_STATUS, i.FG_INQUIRY_CONTENT FROM FG_INQUIRY i JOIN FG_POST p ON i.FG_POST_ID = p.FG_POST_ID JOIN FG_COMMON_USER cu ON p.FG_USER_CODE = cu.FG_USER_CODE JOIN FG_NORMAL_USER nu ON p.FG_USER_CODE = nu.FG_USER_CODE JOIN FG_USER_FILE uf ON p.FG_USER_CODE = uf.FG_USER_CODE WHERE i.FG_POST_ID =#{fgPostId}

SELECT c.FG_POST_ID,cu.FG_USER_TYPE, c.FG_COMMENT_DATE, c.FG_COMMENT_CONTENT, CASE WHEN c.FG_COMMENT_EDIT = '0' THEN ' ' WHEN c.FG_COMMENT_EDIT = '1' THEN '수정됨' END AS isEdited FROM FG_COMMENT c, FG_POST p, FG_COMMON_USER cu WHERE c.FG_POST_ID = p.FG_POST_ID AND c.FG_USER_CODE = cu.FG_USER_CODE AND c.FG_POST_ID = #{fgPostId}
SELECT COUNT(p.FG_POST_ID) FROM FG_POST p INNER JOIN FG_COMMON_USER cu ON p.FG_USER_CODE = cu.FG_USER_CODE WHERE p.FG_POST_TYPE = 'inquiry' AND cu.FG_USER_TYPE = '일반회원'

SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, FG_POST_ID, FG_POST_TITLE, fgPostCreatedAt, FG_INQUIRY_STATUS, FG_NORMAL_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, FG_POST_ID, FG_POST_TITLE, fgPostCreatedAt, FG_NORMAL_NICKNAME, FG_INQUIRY_STATUS FROM ( SELECT i.FG_INQUIRY_STATUS,p.FG_POST_ID,p.FG_POST_TITLE, nu.FG_NORMAL_NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(p.FG_POST_CREATED_AT, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS fgPostCreatedAt FROM FG_INQUIRY i JOIN FG_POST p ON i.FG_POST_ID = p.FG_POST_ID JOIN FG_COMMON_USER cu ON p.FG_USER_CODE = cu.FG_USER_CODE JOIN FG_NORMAL_USER nu ON p.FG_USER_CODE = nu.FG_USER_CODE ORDER BY p.FG_POST_CREATED_AT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{amount} ) WHERE RNUM > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount}
